# 新灵魂观

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/xinlinghunguan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/xinlinghunguan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install xinlinghunguan
xinlinghunguan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xinlinghunguan
xinlinghunguan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
